Experience on the battlefield has given you superior focus to cast your spells. You gain the following benefits:

  • You automatically succeed on CON saves to maintain your concentration on a spell if the DC is equal to or lower than a number equal to 8 + your PB (minimum DC 10).

  • When a hostile creature provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a cantrip instead of making a melee attack.

  • You can use a shield or weapon you are holding as a spellcasting focusâ€”as normal, you can use the same hand or hands holding this focus to perform somatic spell components.
